Figma Templates - A Collection of Free Website Designs

These are designs that I've made in Figma. Feel Free to duplicate them. Hopefully they help you in your website design journey!

Figma is cloud-based design tool that give you the ability to create and mock up designs for websites, mobile apps, and other digital mediums.
